Kejari Bandung Musnahkan Lebih dari Rp 1 Miliar Sabu
06 Nov 2019, 04:27 by Yedi Supriadi
BANDUNG, (PR).- Kejaksaan Negeri Bandung memusnahkan sabu, ganja, obat obatan dan barang rampasan lainnya. Barang bukti bernilai tinggi yang turut dimusnahkan bernilai tinggi yakni narkoba jenis sabu dengan berat 2.661 gram atau senilai lebih dari Rp 1,3 miliar.
Pelaksanaan pemusnahan barang rampasan digelar di halaman kantor Kejaksaan Negeri Bandung, Jln. Jakarta, Kota Bandung, Rabu, 6 November 2019 pagi. 
Pemusnahan dipimpin Kepala Kejari Bandung, Nurizal Nurdin dan dihadiri Wakil Wali Kota Bandung Yana Mulyana, Kepala DPRD Kota Bandung Tedy Rusmawan serta unsur muspida lainnya. "Barang yang dimusnahkan ini merupakan rampasan yang sudah memiliki kekuatan hukum tetap, baik dari pidana umm maupun pidana khusus," kata Nurizal.
Pemusnahan barang rampasan dilakukan lewat tiga cara berbeda. Sejumlah di antaranya dimusnahkan dengan cara diblender, ada yang dilindas dengan menggunakan stoomwall dan dibakar.
Berdasarkan informasi yang diperoleh, barang bukti yang dimusnahkan dari tindak pidana umum sebanyak 678 perkara. Terdiri atas 16,8 kg ganja, 2 ribu gram lebih tembakau gorila, 17,6 gram kokain serta 2.661 gram sabu. Tak cuma itu, juga turut dimusnahkan sebanyak 5.156 tablet psikotropika berbagai merk, seperti ekstasi, dumolid, xanax dan lainnya.
Selain narkotika, Kejari Bandung juga memusnahkan barang bukti dari perkara perjudian berupa ponsel dan alat rekapan. Kemudian ada juga barang bukti perkara pelanggaran Undang-Undang Kesehatan berupa jamu, kosmetik, obat-obatan ilegal, mi dan makanan. 
Kejari Bandung juga memusnahkan ratusan senjata tajam, senjata api, STNK palsu, serta ratusan botol minuman keras.
Wakil Wali Kota Bandung, Yana Mulyana mengapresiasi kegiatan tersebut. Ia berharap, pemusnahan menjadi bagian dari upaya mencegah Kota Bandung sebagai kota tujuan peredaran narkoba.***

Kejari Bandung Destroys More Than Rp. 1 Billion of Methamphetamine
Nov 6 2019, 04:27 by Yedi Supriadi
BANDUNG, (PR) .- The Bandung District Prosecutor's Office has destroyed methamphetamine, cannabis, drugs and other looted goods. High-value evidence that was also destroyed by high-value drugs such as methamphetamine weighing 2,661 grams or valued at more than Rp 1.3 billion.
The eradication of the spoils was held in the courtyard of the Bandung District Attorney's Office, Jln. Jakarta, City of Bandung, Wednesday, November 6 2019 morning.
The extermination was led by the Head of the Bandung Kejari, Nurizal Nurdin and was attended by the Deputy Mayor of Bandung Yana Mulyana, Head of the Bandung City DPRD Tedy Rusmawan and other Muspida elements. "The destroyed goods are spoils that already have permanent legal force, both from the general and special criminal law," Nurizal said.
Destruction of booty is carried out in three different ways. A number of them were destroyed by blending, others were crushed by using stoomwall and burned.
Based on the information obtained, the evidence that was destroyed from general criminal acts was 678 cases. Consisting of 16.8 kg of cannabis, more than 2 thousand grams of gorilla tobacco, 17.6 grams of cocaine and 2,661 grams of methamphetamine. Not only that, but also destroyed as many as 5,156 psychotropic tablets of various brands, such as ecstasy, dumolid, xanax and others.
Besides narcotics, the Bandung Kejari also destroyed evidence from gambling cases in the form of cellphones and recapitulation equipment. Then there is also evidence of cases of violation of the Health Act in the form of herbs, cosmetics, illegal drugs, noodles and food.
Kejari Bandung also destroyed hundreds of sharp weapons, firearms, fake vehicle registration, and hundreds of bottles of liquor.
Deputy Mayor of Bandung, Yana Mulyana appreciated the activity. He hopes that the destruction will be part of efforts to prevent the city of Bandung as a destination city for drug trafficking. ***
